alert.note: Alert for Knox; McCreary; Wayne; Whitley (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued June 11 at 6:58PM EDT until June 11 at 7:30PM EDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in JACKSON KY has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... East central Wayne County in south central Kentucky... West central Knox County in southeastern Kentucky... McCreary County in south central Kentucky... Whitley County in south central Kentucky... * Until 730 PM EDT. * At 658 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Beulah Heights, or near Whitley City, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Krupp around 710 PM EDT. Walden around 715 PM EDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Rockholds, Wilton and Bertha Station. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
